require([
], function() {
  require([
    'skylark-widgets-coder'
  ], function (Coder) {

  new Coder(document.querySelector('#coder-demo-codemirror'), {
    files: [
      {
        type: 'html',
        content: '<html>\n<body>\n<h1>Using CodeMirror</h1>\n</body>\n</html>'
      }
    ],
    pane: 'html',
    addons: {
      general : [
        'render'
      ],
      edit : [
        'codemirror'
      ]      
    }
  });
});
});

</script>
